divs: Sighting DetailsI was being held down in my house in bed. Injected in ankle. Somthing vibrates beside my right knee now at different times. Now there are at least 4 sparkley black small creatures with 3 claws in my home. They growel. They attack me almost daily. They will not leave. I have seen them 4 times. Mostly you can see them. Please help me with whatever you can.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Beaver
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Poss abduction with possible demonic entities still at house.
